ygData.subject: Re: Two ideas for wizards. [on casting time]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oops, now there s a side I didn t consider.  (And I should have, too) Okay, scratch option c) faster casting on a successful check.  =) -Pennaggolan, 3rd
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:53 PM 06/01/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "shypht" <evanschu@...>
>
>I do not think that a shorter casting time would make that much of a diff.
>"ooh, I can get off more
>spells faster just to have a mob turn on me, wow! that is so much better
>then a magician". That
>is just my take on it. I would rather have concentration allow for more mana
>efficent casting, which
>can be done by reducing the ammount of mana needed, or by upping the damage
>done.

Oops, now there's a side I didn't consider. (And I should have, too)
Okay, scratch
option c) faster casting on a successful check. =)

-Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
